Package uo.ri.cws.application.service.mechanic

Interface MechanicCrudService

All Known Implementing Classes:
MechanicCrudServiceImpl
public interface MechanicCrudService
This service is intended to be used by the Manager It follows the ISP principle (@see SOLID principles from RC Martin)

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Interface Description
    static class  MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto addMechanic​(MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto mecanico)
    Add a new mechanic to the system with the data specified in the dto.
    void deleteMechanic​(java.lang.String idMecanico)  
    java.util.List<MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto> findAllMechanics()  
    java.util.Optional<MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto> findMechanicById​(java.lang.String id)  
    void updateMechanic​(MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto mechanic)
    Updates values for the mechanic specified by the id field, just name and surname will be updated

  • Method Details

    • addMechanic

      MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto addMechanic​(MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto mecanico) throws BusinessException
      Add a new mechanic to the system with the data specified in the dto. The id value will be ignored
      Parameters:
      mecanico - dto
      Returns:
      the dto with the id filed updated to the UUID generated
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if there already exist another mechanic with the same dni

    • deleteMechanic

      void deleteMechanic​(java.lang.String idMecanico) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      idMecanico -
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if the mechanic does not exist

    • updateMechanic

      void updateMechanic​(MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto mechanic) throws BusinessException
      Updates values for the mechanic specified by the id field, just name and surname will be updated
      Parameters:
      mechanic - dto, the id field, name and surname cannot be null
      Throws:
      BusinessException - if the mechanic does not exist

    • findMechanicById

      java.util.Optional<MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto> findMechanicById​(java.lang.String id) throws BusinessException
      Parameters:
      id - of the mechanic
      Returns:
      the dto for the mechanic or null if there is none with the id DOES NOT @throws BusinessException
      Throws:
      BusinessException

    • findAllMechanics

      java.util.List<MechanicCrudService.MechanicDto> findAllMechanics() throws BusinessException
      Returns:
      the list of all mechanics registered in the system without regarding their contract status or if they have contract or not. It might be an empty list if there is no mechanic DOES NOT @throws BusinessException
      Throws:
      BusinessException
